page.title: 07MATTESONS EMPLOYMENT POLICY
page.content: They employ 50_60 people on a permanent basis.The number increases to around 400 during the summer season when they extend their range of food products.People are taken on in the summer months on a 13_week contract. This includes students on holiday.This means that people are not made redundant. The firm try to prevent anyone having to leave,but we were told that they must be efficient and employ only the people who can be fully productive.The use of computers at this site has played a large part in increasing efficiency.Before,they were tied in to the London office computer but as the buisness has grown they now make their own forecasts for the future.They order goods through the computer.
